page.title: 04MY DAY BY ANDREW BLOW AGE 7
page.content: I usually wake upat 7am.Then I play a game with my brother David.Mummy tells us to get dressed and we go down for our breakfast,which usually consists of toast,fruit juice and cereal. Daddy leaves for work and we then set of for my school at 8.30am. When I arrive at school I go straight into my classroom to wait for my teacher to arrive.She calls the register and then gives us some writing or sums to do until lunchtime.At lunchtime I eat my sandwiches in the dining room before going out onto the fields to play football with my friends.In the afternoon we put on our plimsoles to do activities .Mummy comes to collect me at 3.30pm to go home.When I get home I play on my BMX bike for a while ,have tea and watch TV.It is then time for my bath,a story and off to bed.
